name: faq-questions-standard
description: Standard FAQ questions section with expandable answers and clean design.
useCase: Display frequently asked questions with expandable answers for better user experience.

data.title: Frequently Asked Questions
data.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our products and services.

questions.question: How do I get started with your platform?
questions.answer: Getting started is easy! Simply sign up for an account, complete your profile setup, and follow our onboarding guide. We'll walk you through each step to ensure you're up and running quickly.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers. All payments are processed securely through our encrypted payment system.

questions.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
questions.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. Your access will continue until the end of your current billing period, and you won't be charged again.

questions.question: Do you offer customer support?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We provide 24/7 customer support via email, live chat, and phone. Our support team is here to help you with any questions or issues you may have.

questions.question: Is my data secure?
questions.answer: Yes, we take data security very seriously. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest, and we're SOC 2 compliant. We also offer two-factor authentication for added security.

questions.question: Can I integrate with other tools?
questions.answer: Yes! We offer integrations with over 100+ popular tools including Slack, Zapier, Salesforce, and many more. Check our integrations page for the complete list.
